Header: 54 Div GOC Greeted Upon His Promotion
Content: The newly-promoted Major General Senarath Bandara, General Officer Commanding (GOC), 54 Division was accorded a welcome plus felicitation ceremony on Tuesday (4) at the 54 Division Headquarters in Thaladi, Mannar. The day’s event commenced with a parade after the newly-promoted Major General Bandara arrived at the 54 Division Headquarters premises where religious observances took the centre-stage. As the next segment of the day’s reception, Major General Bandara addressed under command troops and subsequently shared refreshments with everyone present. Senior Staff Officers at the 54 Division Headquarters, Brigade Commanders, Commanding Officers of under command formations, Officers and Other Ranks were present at the event.
